document_data.name: Sylora Salm
document_data.mainbody: '''Sylora Salm''' was a [[sorceress]] of [[Thay]] who served [[Szass Tam]].

History.Death: Sylora died at the hands of the [[mummy]] [[Jestry Rallevin|Jestry]] after being defeated by the trio [[Drizzt Do'Urden]], Dahlia, and [[Artemis Entreri]] in the {{YearlinkName|1463}}.
